attributes.action: Improve security at Selly Oaks military ward  & compel Lynn Jones (MP) to apologise for the demeaning remarks made regarding British military personnel…
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In response to another case of abuse of British personnel at Selly Oak. Lynn Jones, Labour MP for Selly Oak refused to back calls for more secure facilities for injured military patients.

She even went on to demean and patronise the personnel injured in Labours war by claiming that

"The soldiers seem to want a little empire consisting of their own designated staff and facilities, a fiefdom," she told the MoS.


This petition has two parts

•	To compel the labour MP for Selly Oak to retract her comments and to offer an unreserved apology to those military patients who have suffered abuse.

•	To ensure security is improved to prevent this happening again in the future.
